content.description:
Julia Thought She Freed Someone

Sed mihi manifestusmanifestus, -a, -um, adj.: obvious, apparent errorerror, -oris, m.: mistake videtur, igiturque puto nobis, 
quasi scripserit Iulia, faciendum, quod ipsa scripsisse 
se credidit. Moretur ergo in libertate praesidio nostro
quasi omnia diligentissime caverit.
content.question: Sed mihi manifestus error videtur (line 1) is translated

choices.label: But I clearly see my mistake
But my mistake will seem obvious
But to me the mistake seems obvious
But the more obvious mistake will be seen by me

content.answer: But to me the mistake seems obvious

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
